rules.name: myRule_5
rules.label: changing record types - paper to web, all IPM

rules.name: myRule_7
rules.label: changing record type - paper to web

Flow.description: LM - when record type changes from Web Based Onboarding to New Business Onboarding, send chatter, CM - when record type changes from Paper Based Onboarding to Web Based Onboarding

value.stringValue: PRIORVALUE( [Reference_PEO__c].RecordType.Name ) = 'PEO Web Based Onboarding' && [Reference_PEO__c].RecordType.Name = 'PEO Paper Based Onboarding' && [Reference_PEO__c].All_IPMs__c = true

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
